name: Lit the Dungeon
description:
No obstacle is too hard for a well prepared mage. That is why when you go off to explore a new dungeon your grimoire is always filled with... fireballs!

Controls: AWSD [move]
                      space-bar [fireball]

"Lit the Dungeon" was created in one week for VimJam3 with the focus: Multi-use and the theme: TURN UP THE HEAT.
